analysis.description: releaseRatio in Locker.getVariableReleasableAmount (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#513) is a local variable never initialiazed

Locker.release (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#422-449) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,releasableAmount) (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#447-449)

Reentrancy in Locker.activate (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#322-342):
	External calls:
	- initialBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#330-331)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- activeTime (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#333-334)
	- state (/unique_chucks/39/0x0b97e04b413da101b340dd9ed07e0b063e72bc75.sol#339-340)
